steps.title: Draw a stick figure from the head to the torso.
steps.content: Draw a stick figure from the head to the torso.

steps.title: Add volume to your stick figure.
steps.content: Add volume to your stick figure. Iron man’s shoulders are rounded.

steps.title: Add simple details to his suit like the inverted triangle on his chest and other notable features.
steps.content: Add simple details to his suit like the inverted triangle on his chest and other notable features.

steps.title: Erase lines from your outline and add more specific details to the suit.
steps.content: Erase lines from your outline and add more specific details to the suit. Most of the details are drawn using straight lines, some are slanted.

steps.title: Add the smaller details on iron man’s suit.
steps.content: Add the smaller details on iron man’s suit.

steps.title: Color your drawing.
steps.content: Color your drawing.

steps.title: Draw a rectangle and an oval.
steps.content: Draw a rectangle and an oval.

steps.title: Add two big rectangles for his legs and four ovals and two rectangles for arms.
steps.content: Add two big rectangles for his legs and four ovals and two rectangles for arms.

steps.title: Draw nine new rectangles.
steps.content: Draw nine new rectangles.

steps.title: On top of his head add an oval.
steps.content: On top of his head add an oval. Draw some connecting lines.

steps.title: Draw more connecting lines, as shown.
steps.content: Draw more connecting lines, as shown.

steps.title: Add the rest of needed details.
steps.content: Add the rest of needed details.

steps.title: Erase guidelines.
steps.content: Erase guidelines.

steps.title: Start coloring.
steps.content: Start coloring.

steps.title: Finished.
steps.content: Finished.

steps.title: First, draw one oval and one vertical line.
steps.content: First, draw one oval and one vertical line.

steps.title: Draw one rectangle and two ovals.
steps.content: Draw one rectangle and two ovals.

steps.title: Add three rectangles and one oval.
steps.content: Add three rectangles and one oval.

steps.title: Add a bunch of geometrical shapes to mark his strong arms.
steps.content: Add a bunch of geometrical shapes to mark his strong arms.

steps.title: Start connecting these shapes.
steps.content: Start connecting these shapes.

steps.title: Now, you need to draw many details.
steps.content: Now, you need to draw many details.

steps.title: Erase some lines which are not needed anymore.
steps.content: Erase some lines which are not needed anymore.

steps.title: Color the drawing.
steps.content: Color the drawing.

steps.title: Draw a stick figure with your desired pose.
steps.content: Draw a stick figure with your desired pose.

steps.title: Add volume to your stick figure.
steps.content: Add volume to your stick figure. Take note of the joints.

steps.title: Add simple details to iron man’s suit.
steps.content: Add simple details to iron man’s suit.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines from your outline and add more specific details to iron man’s suit to make him look more machine-like.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines from your outline and add more specific details to iron man’s suit to make him look more machine-like.
